itemDisplayName: Deploy a Trusted Launch Ubuntu Linux VM 18_04-lts-gen2.
description: This template deploy a Trusted Launch Ubuntu Server with a few options for the VM. You can provide the VM Name, OS Version, VM size, admin username and password. As default the VM size is Standard_D2s_v3 and O.S. Version is 18_04-lts-gen2.
summary: This template takes a minimum amount of parameters and deploys a Trusted Launch Linux VM, using the latest patched version.
